name: swivel
description: Message passing between ServiceWorker and pages made simple
author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)

scripts.build: browserify -s swivel -do dist/swivel.js swivel.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/swivel.min.js dist/swivel.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && git reset HEAD~1 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
